    • 方法详细资料

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected()
        Return whether network is connected.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />

        返回:
        true: connected
        false: disconnected

      • isAvailableByPing

        public static boolean isAvailableByPing()
        Return whether network is available using ping.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

        The default ping ip: 223.5.5.5

        返回:
        true: yes
        false: no

      • isAvailableByPing

        public static boolean isAvailableByPing(java.lang.String ip)
        Return whether network is available using ping.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

        参数:
        ip - The ip address.
        返回:
        true: yes
        false: no

      • getMobileDataEnabled

        public static boolean getMobileDataEnabled()
        Return whether mobile data is enabled.
        返回:
        true: enabled
        false: disabled

      • setMobileDataEnabled

        public static boolean setMobileDataEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable mobile data.

        Must hold android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system", <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE" />

        参数:
        enabled - True to enabled, false otherwise.
        返回:
        true: success
        false: fail

      • isMobileData

        public static boolean isMobileData()
        Return whether using mobile data.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />

        返回:
        true: yes
        false: no

      • is4G

        public static boolean is4G()
        Return whether using 4G.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />

        返回:
        true: yes
        false: no

      • getWifiEnabled

        public static boolean getWifiEnabled()
        Return whether wifi is enabled.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" />

        返回:
        true: enabled
        false: disabled

      • setWifiEnabled

        public static void setWifiEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable wifi.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE" />

        参数:
        enabled - True to enabled, false otherwise.

      • isWifiConnected

        public static boolean isWifiConnected()
        Return whether wifi is connected.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />

        返回:
        true: connected
        false: disconnected

      • isWifiAvailable

        public static boolean isWifiAvailable()
        Return whether wifi is available.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" />, <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

        返回:
        true: available
        false: unavailable

      • getNetworkOperatorName

        public static java.lang.String getNetworkOperatorName()
        Return the name of network operate.
        返回:
        the name of network operate

      • getNetworkType

        public static NetworkUtils.NetworkType getNetworkType()
        Return type of network.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />

        返回:
        type of network
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_ETHERNET
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_WIFI
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_4G
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_3G
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_2G
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_UNKNOWN
        • NetworkUtils.NetworkType.NETWORK_NO

      • getIPAddress

        public static java.lang.String getIPAddress(boolean useIPv4)
        Return the ip address.

        Must hold <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

        参数:
        useIPv4 - True to use ipv4, false otherwise.
        返回:
        the ip address
